result.title: Coder's Calendar â€” Android App (Update: Material-ish design)
result.content:
Hi everyone,
A few weeks ago,I had written about a Chrome and Firefox extension that I had created called Coder's Calendar which displayed a list of live and upcoming coding contests.(read about it here)

I've created and published an Android app of the same.

Download from here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.corphots.coderscalendar

If you find the app to be useful,please rate or review it.

Star the project on Github to show your support: https://github.com/nishanthvijayan/CoderCalender

Features

  • All Contests are sorted chronologically
  • Add contests as events to your calendar app.
  • Let others know about contests using the share feature.
  • View updates only from websites that you choose.
  • Supports all popular platforms

If you find any bugs or have any suggestions to make regarding the app,please comment below
or add it as an issue here : https://github.com/nishanthvijayan/CoderCalendar/issues
